summary: Anne Neuberger, the Biden administration’s deputy national security adviser for cyber, tells WIRED about emerging cybersecurity threats—and what the US plans to do about them.
title: A Top White House Cyber Official Sees the ‘Promise and Peril’ in AI
detailed_content: When Anne Neuberger stepped into the newly created role of deputy national security adviser for cyber and emerging technology on the White House’s National Security Council at the start of the Biden administration, she was already one of the government’s most experienced cyber veterans.
author: BY GARRETT M. GRAFF
